code: import React from"react";import{useTheme}from"../ThemeContext";import"./ToggleButton.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const ToggleButton=()=>{const{theme,toggleTheme}=useTheme();return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"btn-container ".concat(theme==="dark"?"dark":""),children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:toggleTheme,className:"theme-btn ".concat(theme==="dark"?"dark":""),children:theme==="light"?"Dark Mode":"Light Mode"})});};export default ToggleButton;
